mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY DATA_INDEX DESC) RNUM, DATA_INDEX, DATA_THUMB, DATA_TITLE, DATA_CONTENT, DATA_IMG, DATA_SIZE, DATA_KATE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY DATA_INDEX DESC) RNUM, DATA_INDEX, DATA_THUMB, DATA_TITLE, DATA_CONTENT, DATA_IMG, DATA_SIZE, DATA_KATE FROM TB_DATA WHERE DATA_KATE = 'N')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_DATA( DATA_INDEX, DATA_IMG, DATA_THUMB, DATA_TITLE, DATA_CONTENT, DATA_SIZE ) VALUES( TB_DATA_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{DATA_IMG}, #{DATA_THUMB}, #{DATA_TITLE}, #{DATA_CONTENT}, #{DATA_SIZE} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_DATA SET DATA_IMG = #{DATA_IMG}, DATA_TITLE = #{DATA_TITLE}, DATA_CONTENT = #{DATA_CONTENT}, DATA_THUMB = #{DATA_THUMB}, DATA_SIZE = #{DATA_SIZE}, DATA_KATE = #{DATA_KATE} WHERE DATA_INDEX = #{DATA_INDEX}
